| History                 = The NYPD's history is presumably similar to their [[Earth-616]] [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|counterpart]]'s.

The NYPD was mentioned twice by [[Peter Parker (Earth-TRN848)|Spider-Man]], including mentioning that the police took bets over which costume he would wear.{{r|Spider-Man: Spider's Shadow Vol 1 1}}

When Spider-Man killed the [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-TRN848)|Kingpin]], the Kingpin made sure Spider-Man's identity as Peter Parker. The NYPD eventually surrounded Peter's apartment to arrest him for the various he committed.{{r|Spider-Man: Spider's Shadow Vol 1 3}}
